user_question: What are the ideal conditions for storing a bottle of 1982 Château Margaux?
final_answer: The ideal conditions for storing a bottle of 1982 Château Margaux are a temperature of 55°F (13°C), 70% humidity, stored horizontally in a dark, vibration-free environment.
